name: Black Hole (itch) (MikkoK)
description:
Black Hole is an endless faller game where you are an astronaut trapped in a black hole, you have to dodge objects that have also been sucked into the black hole and see how far you can go! Remember to share your high score on the comments below!

This game was developed for Friday Night Game Jam 42 where the theme was Infinity.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

M to mute/unmute music
